references.reason: This paper is a foundational technical report on GPT-4, a large language model used for generating pseudo 3D annotations in ImOV3D.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: CLIP, introduced in this paper, is a crucial component of ImOV3D, providing the multimodal foundation for transferring 2D knowledge to 3D.

references.paper_title: Deep Hough voting for 3d object detection in point clouds
references.reason: ImVoteNet, based on this paper, is the core 3D object detection architecture enhanced by ImOV3D for open-vocabulary 3D object detection.

references.paper_title: Imvotenet: Boosting 3d object detection in point clouds with image votes
references.reason: ImVoteNet, the foundation of ImOV3D, is directly built upon this work, combining point cloud and image information for improved 3D object detection.

references.paper_title: Scannet: Richly-annotated 3d reconstructions of indoor scenes
references.reason: ScanNet is a key benchmark dataset used in the paper for evaluating the performance of ImOV3D and comparing against other state-of-the-art methods.
